section.title: Removing a Storage Quality of Service Entry
section.para: Remove an existing storage quality of service entry.

procedure.title: Removing a Storage Quality of Service Entry

step.para: Click the Data Centers resource tab and select a data center.
Click QoS in the details pane.
Select the storage quality of service entry to remove.

section.para: You have removed the storage quality of service entry, and that entry is no longer available. If any disk profiles were based on that entry, the storage quality of service entry for those profiles is automatically set to [unlimited].
